frontmatter.title: Hits and Damage in Multiplayer Games in Unity
frontmatter.excerpt: After getting started with Unity and Virtual Reality, you now have a world. You've made it multiplayer with Normcore and are hanging out with your friends. To turn this into a game you need to introduce hits and damage.
